name: Cone Clicker [BETA]
description:
Cone Clicker is an incremental game developed by War Cat Studios,  it gets more complex as you play and has multiple mechanics that intertwine to make up Cone Clicker.   This game is still in beta testing and we are open to advice!

To support me visit my Patreon.

To see youtube Devlogs, visit my channel.

Join our Discord Server to talk to me and give feedback.

Join the Trello to see our game's plans.
